snippet: In a story Aug. 15 about efforts to create more national monuments, The Associated Press reported erroneously that President Barack Obama has created or expanded the most national monuments of any president. Obama has protected more land and water...
lead_paragraph: In a story Aug. 15 about efforts to create more national monuments, The Associated Press reported erroneously that President Barack Obama has created or expanded the most national monuments of any president. Obama has protected more land and water using national monument designations than any other president. But in total number of monuments, he falls short of President Franklin Roosevelt.
